data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Hami, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hami, Xinjiang Uygur, China

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Hami, Xinjiang Uygur, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Hami, Xinjiang Uygur, China to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Hami, Xinjiang Uygur, China who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Uyghur people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Uyghur people.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Hami words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Hami who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the county of Hami, Xinjiang Uygur, China has a population of 137,100.

We estimate Hami has 10,401 people who might know Jesus, 2,215 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 124,485 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Hami, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
